name: Omega Commando (itch)
description:
Battle an onslaught of robots to save humanity from annihilation.

Use advanced weapons and technology to complete 3 pulse pounding missions.

High intensity third-person shooter action.

Recommended Hardware

• Desktop PC or Mac.
• Windows 7 64-bit or Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later.
• Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
• NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD or higher.
• 8 GB RAM.
